snippet: With reports of the Syrian government taking control of the main rebel stronghold, the horrors keep mounting. So must the pressure on President Assad.
abstract: Editorial observes that with reports of the Syrian government taking control of main rebel stronghold Homs, the horrors in Syria keep mounting; calls for the international community, including Pres Bashar al-Assad's main enablers Russia and China, to keep stepping up pressure to force Assad to step down and end the merciless slaughter of the Syrian people.
lead_paragraph: With reports of the Syrian government taking control of the main rebel stronghold, the horrors keep mounting. So must the pressure on President Assad.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
